mapper.insert: insert into USERS(USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_GENDER, USER_DATE, USER_PHONE, USER_JOIN, DEPT_NO, TEAM_NO, POSITION_NO, ROLE_NO) values(#{id},#{pwd},#{name},#{gender},#{birthday},#{phone},#{enterdate},#{deptno},#{teamnum},#{jobnum},5)
mapper.select: select USER_ID from USERS where USER_ID=#{id} AND pwd=#{pwd}
select USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_GENDER, USER_DATE, USER_PHONE, USER_JOIN, DEPT_NO, TEAM_NO, POSITION_NO from USERS where USER_ID=#{id}
mapper.update: update USERS set USER_PASSWORD=#{pwd}, USER_PHONE=#{phone}, DEPT_NO=#{deptno}, TEAM_NO=#{teamnum}, POSITION_NO=#{jobnum} where USER_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select TEAM_NO, DEPT_NO, team_name from team
